adevlibs.net.apitasks

Class AsyncPostMachineTask<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Object>
      • adevlibs.net.apitasks.AsyncPostMachineTask<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITask
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncHttpClientTask, AsyncHttpUrlConnectionTask, AsyncImgUploadTask

    public abstract class AsyncPostMachineTask<T>
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Object>
implements ITask
    AsyncTask的子类，采用短连接的形式和Server进行String类型的数据交互。
